tool_description: Registers samples in the laboratory information system with complete metadata and tracking information.

ordered_tests.description: List of test codes ordered for this sample

priority_level.description: Sample priority: ROUTINE, URGENT, or STAT

collection_volume.description: Volume of sample collected in mL

error_messages: Duplicate barcode: Sample with this barcode already exists in the system.
Invalid patient reference: patient_id does not exist or is inactive.
Invalid collection datetime: Must be in ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Unauthorized collector: collector_id is not valid or not certified.
Empty test list: At least one test code must be specified in ordered_tests.
Invalid priority level: Use ROUTINE, URGENT, or STAT.
Invalid collection volume: Must be a positive number if specified.
Unknown collection site: collection_site is not a recognized location.
usage: Provide all required parameters to register a sample in the system. The sample becomes available for processing and tracking after successful registration.

registration_id.description: Unique registration identifier in the system

registration_status.description: Status of registration: SUCCESS or FAILED

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion time for all ordered tests

assigned_lab_sections.description: Laboratory sections assigned to process the tests
